condition-effectdesc: A condition combines multiple effects into one.
disease-effectdesc: Some diseases can be spread to other players.
momentum-effectdesc: Increases your mining speed with a specific tool by {0:P2}.
heated-effectdesc: Increases your body temperature every {1:N2} seconds by {0:N2} up to a temperature of {2:N2}.
trigger-effectdesc: Triggers the "{1}" effect for {2:N2} seconds after this effect expires.
health-effectdesc: Increases your maximum health by {0:N2} points.
meleeWeaponsDamage-effectdesc: Increases your melee weapons damage by {0:P2}.
rangedWeaponsDamage-effectdesc: Erhöht den Schaden deiner Fernkampfwaffen um {0:P2}.
nutrition-effectdesc: Modifies the nutrition value of a specific food category by {0:N2} points every {1:N2} seconds.
nutritionFruit-effectdesc: Modifies your fruit nutrition value by {0:N2} points every {1:N2} seconds.
nutritionVegetable-effectdesc: Modifies your vegetable nutrition value by {0:N2} points every {1:N2} seconds.
nutritionProtein-effectdesc: Modifies your protein nutrition value by {0:N2} points every {1:N2} seconds.
nutritionGrain-effectdesc: Modifies your grain nutrition value by {0:N2} points every {1:N2} seconds.
nutritionDairy-effectdesc: Modifies your dairy nutrition value by {0:N2} points every {1:N2} seconds.
colorblind-effectdesc: You lost the ability to distinguish between different colors.
